segments.text: I ’ m making a list of food and drinks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What for ? For the party , of course .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We ’ re having a Valentine ’ s Day Party .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I forget . Who ’ s invited ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We ’ Ve invited all our sophomore friends from school .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I help you get ready ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ ll be a big help . Well , here ’ s a list of some of the food you could buy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , just leave it to me . I ’ ll take care of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . See you at five . Don ’ t forget to bring your valentine .
segments.speaker: S2
